title: Describing Trends - Part B
content: Which description matches the graph? Select the correct answer for each question.

questions.instructions: Look at the graph and select the description that matches it.
questions.question: Which description matches the graph?
questions.no_answer_feedback: Please select an answer. The correct description is: A significant increase – a dramatic rise – a slight decrease.
questions.correct_feedback: Correct! This description accurately matches the trend shown in the graph.
questions.incorrect_feedback: Incorrect. Look carefully at the graph. The correct description is: A significant increase – a dramatic rise – a slight decrease.

mc_options.text: A slight increase – a significant rise – a slight decrease
mc_options.feedback: Incorrect. The initial increase is significant, not slight. The correct answer is: A significant increase – a dramatic rise – a slight decrease.
